descriptions: ["DescriptionImmaculateHigh floorVacant on TransferCash propertyHouse Hunters are delighted to exclusively offer this spacious one bedroom apartment with a balcony overlooking the canal. When you enter the apartment the corridor opens up into an extremely bright living room with a floor to ceiling window. The apartment has very large bathroom with a walk-in shower and a separate bathtub. The apartment has double glazed windows, high ceilings, the finest kitchen & bathroom fittings, quality floor tiles, stone counter tops and elegant cabinetry. The kitchen is fully equipped, including cooker, oven, fridge,freezer, dish washer and washing machine. There is one car park reserved space on the parking area. Links Towers have the best facilities, most modern swimming pools facing the golf course, state of the art gym with plasma TV screens, indoor / outdoor children's play area, BBQ area. The property will be vacant on transfer.House Hunters Real Estate are known as the No 1 Preferred Agency in Arabian Ranches. We are the original and only specialist having sold and rented hundreds of properties in the Ranches in our 16 year history. Being present now in the retail center for 12 years, it is understandable why we are the number one choice for both tenants and landlords alike. Landlords have come to learn just how quickly we turn these properties around and as a result we have the most extensive, current list of property in the market.  Our agents are available 7 days a week, 8:30 am - 8:30 pm daily at the Ranches Retail Center. So why not pass by for a chat with one of our experienced agents today.Permit no.\xa00783177775"]
